New Records: India recorded the highest score in a T20 World Cup final with 176/7
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 76 off 48 balls
Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 4 runs
Ravindra Jadeja's brilliant direct hit to dismiss Tristan Stubbs
Suryakumar Yadav's incredible catch to dismiss David Miller
Hardik Pandya's brilliant over to dismiss Heinrich Klaasen and David Miller
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed pride in the team's performance and announced his retirement from T20Is
Rohit Sharma congratulated the team on their win and thanked the management
Jasprit Bumrah was awarded the player of the tournament award
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Kensington Oval in Barbados
The crowd was electric, with fans from India and South Africa cheering for their teams
Others: The match was a thrilling finale to the T20 World Cup 2024
The result marked India's first T20 World Cup title
